paper_abstract: Suppose G is a graph and d(G)(x,y) denotes the length of a minimum path connecting vertices x and y of G. In this paper, some distance-based polynomials such as Hosoya, edge Wiener, Schultz and Gutman polynomials and their relationship are investigated. The Schultz polynomial of some graph operations is also computed. Finally, the mathematical properties of a new two variables polynomial are presented.
paper_title: Some New Results on Distance-Based Polynomials
